title: How Supply-Chain Disruptions Are Impacting Inflation
description: As supply-chain disruptions cause delays and higher prices, Global Investment Research’s Joseph Briggs explains the impact on inflation and the rates market.
itunes:author: Goldman Sachs
itunes:summary: As supply-chain disruptions cause delays and higher prices, Global Investment Research’s Joseph Briggs explains the impact on inflation and the rates market.
